# [Reputation-Based Incentive Model for Decentralized Analysis of Development Proposals](https://api.zotero.org/groups/478201/items/C8WLNYL8/file/view?key=PnpP8O1NApZMMF0LVNh7I4I5)

September/2023, IDAACS 2023

REPUTATION

In this paper we present a reputation-based incentive model for community-driven decentralized analysis of cryptocurrency platform development proposals. Firstly, we consider how the rewards of Proposal Assessors (who write assessments on proposals) and Veteran Proposal Assessors (who rank assessments) depend on the different types of work theyâ€™ve done. Then, we consider the definition and properties of the reputation function and present a rationale for selecting coefficients for different types of work.
